Tweet_Content: Fini le jonglage entre dix onglets pour générer vos visuels : le géant de la retouche accueille désormais l'un des moteurs d'images les plus puissants du moment, et croyez-moi, ça va secouer vos habitudes créatives
translated_text: End of juggling between ten tabs to generate your visuals: the editing giant is now hosting one of the most powerful image engines of the moment, and believe me, it's going to shake your creative habits.

Tweet_Content: $ADBE ’s ecosystem isn’t just software it’s a creative operating system. Once you’re inside Photoshop, Premiere, Illustrator, After Effects, Acrobat, Lightroom… switching becomes almost impossible. A defensive wall that competitors simply can’t replicate.
translated_text: $ADBE ’s ecosystem isn’t just software it’s a creative operating system. Once you’re inside Photoshop, Premiere, Illustrator, After Effects, Acrobat, Lightroom… switching becomes almost impossible. A defensive wall that competitors simply can’t replicate.

Tweet_Content:
みなさんは画像や素材の管理にアプリ使ってますか

私はこれまで普通にフォルダで素材を管理していたんですが、
ファイルが増えてくると探すのがちょっと手間だなあと思い、
試しにEagleを使ってみたらめちゃくちゃ便利で感動！

でも1ヶ月の試用期間が終わると課金制なので
translated_text: Do you guys use an app to manage images and stuff? I used to manage stuff in a folder, but I thought it would be a bit of a hassle to look up more files, and I tried using Eagle, and it was really helpful and exciting.
